column5: I grew up in Orillia and recently bought a home in Barrie so I am pretty up to speed on Simcoe/Couchiching and lake fishing in general. I was wondering if within 45 minutes or so there is accessible Brook Trout or other river and stream species that are available. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Explore some of the notty tribs.  You should be pleasantly surprised!
Open up the page of the regs with the list of tribs in your area. Tape it to the wall, close your eyes and throw a dart. Whatever it hits, try that area.
Thanks very much guys. I was wondering how good the Notts tribs were this time of year, but I guess that has been answered.
